text: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ

translation.en.sahih: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
translation.id.indonesian: kepada Fir'aun dan pembesar-pembesar kaumnya, maka mereka ini takbur dan mereka adalah orang-orang yang sombong.
